page.title: 13ETON COLLEGE
page.content: We interviewed two Eton College boys. We started by asking them if they enjoyed College.They said it was good for the first two or three years and then it got a bit boring.They said Americans loved their uniform and liked to see them wearing it.The boys said that at first they didn't like the collars because they were stiff but they soon got used to them.They don't wear uniform in their leisure time. They have excellent sports facilities.They think the golf course is very good,they have tennis courts, a swimming pool,cricket fields and a good running track.They think the teaching at Eton is very good.On Sundays they may get invited to tea at a different house.Their rooms are small but they don't spend much time in them.The boys we talked to are allowed into Windsor,Slough and London
